comparison.description: Determines how the distance (in blocks) between the actor and target entities should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the distance (in blocks) between the actor and target entities should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the distance (in blocks) between the actor and target entities will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the distance (in blocks) between the actor and target entities will be compared to.

type.description:
## Distance

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/distance)

Checks the distance between the target entity and the actor entity.

Type ID: `origins:distance`

---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:distance",
    "comparison": "<=",
    "compare_to": 30
}
```

This example will check if the target entity is within 30 blocks radius relative from the actor entity.
